content: We have added the C-CDA guide to the build some time ago. However, in the publish/profilelist.html, the guide does not show up. I notice that some of the other guides have additional files in their source directory (such as a registry.html file), so it seems we are missing some things. Is there any documentation on what needs to be done to fully add a guide to the build?
Can't promise it's totally up-to-date, but it's pretty recent so it should be close.
Can't promise it's totally up-to-date, but it's pretty recent so it should be close.

I have followed everything on that page, but there must be something I am missing. For some reason the guide is not showing up on the /publish/profilelist.html page. Should it? It looks like the guide is built, but not showing up in the documentation. Is there some place I can look to try to figure this out (maybe point me to the code that generates the profile documentation and I can reverse engineer).
profilelist.html is things that are core. Yoru IG should show on iglist.html
thought that is hand edited - you have to add it yourself
